<<<<<<< HEAD
Christian praiers and holie meditations as wel for priuate as publique exercise: gathered out of the most godly learned in our time, by Henrie Bull. Whereunto are added the praiers, commonly called Lidleys praiers. Christian praiers and holy meditations Bull, Henry, d. 1575? Ledley, John. Bradford, John, 1510?-1555. Godlie instruction, conteining the summe of all the divinitie necessary for a Christian conscience. aut
440, [6] p.
Printed by R. Robinson, for S. Waterson. and N. Ling, At London : 1596.
Includes, with caption title, "A godlie instruction, conteining the summe of all the divinitie necessary for a Christian conscience". Signatures: A-2E (-2E8, blank?). Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======

Godlie instruction, conteining the summe of all the divinitie necessary for a Christian conscience. aut
440, [6] p.
Printed by R. Robinson, for S. Waterson. and N. Ling, At London : 1596.
Includes, with caption title, "A godlie instruction, conteining the summe of all the divinitie necessary for a Christian conscience". Signatures: A-2E (-2E8, blank?). Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
